## Comparable Company Method: Unlever and Relever Beta A comparable firm has **β = 1.32**, **D/E = 0.41**, **tax = 30**%. **(a)** Compute the **unlevered beta** for the business. ::: {.question-block}
✅ **Step 1 (remove leverage):** βU = βL / [1 + (1 − T) × (D/E)] → business-only risk. **Your numbers:** 1.32 / [1 + (1 − 0.3) × 0.41] = **1.03**.
::: **(b)** Your **target firm** will finance the project at **D/E = 0.69**. Compute the **relevered beta** to be used in CAPM. ::: {.question-block}
✅ **Step 2 (apply target leverage):** βL = βU × [1 + (1 − T) × (D/E)]. **Your numbers:** 1.0256 × [1 + (1 − 0.3) × 0.69] = **1.52**. This aligns the project’s risk with **your capital structure**.
:::
